title: 20 Pat Flynn: How to Let Go, Create Passive Income and Achieve Inner Greatness
description: Let go. Let go of your lame excuses. Let go of your crappy beliefs. Let go that it's hard to make enough money to live a great life. Let go that you have to work a million hours a month to build an amazing business. Let go that you have to be stuck in a […]
